verbs.description: irvin [ARG1: mayfield trial] [V: delayed] [ARG2: to april 2019] irvin mayfield faces 23 felony counts and his partner ronald markham has been charged with 22 counts for allegedly lining their pockets and supporting their jazz orchestra with more than 1 3 million from the new orleans public library foundation irvin mayfield library foundation new orleans new orleans jazz orchestra ronald markham new orleans public library foundation partner
